enWisdom: Struggling [in the way of Allah] is the pillar of faith and the path of the felicitous
The doors of the heavens are opened for those who strive [in the way of Allah]

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَوَّلَ مَا تَغْلِبُونَ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْجِهَادِ جِهَادٌ بِأَيْدِيكُمْ ثُمَّ بِأَلْسِنَتِكُمْ ثُمَّ بِقُلُوبِكُمْ فَمَنْ لَمْ يَعْرِفْ بِقَلْبِهِ مَعْرُوفاً وَلَمْ يُنْكِرْ مُنْكَراً قُلِّبَ فَجُعِلَ أَعْلَاهُ أَسْفَلَهُ
enWisdom: The first thing which you overcome through Jih?d is through striving with your hands, then [if this is not possible] by your tongue, then [if this is not possible] with your hearts; and the one who neither supports good with his heart nor censures evil, is turned upside down [iewill face the wrath of Allah]

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَكْرَمَ الْمَوْتِ الْقَتْلُ وَالَّذِي نَفْسِي بِيَدِهِ لَأَلْفُ ضَرْبَةٍ بِالسَّيْفِ أَهْوَنُ مِنْ مِيتَةٍ عَلَى الْفِرَاشِ
enWisdom: Verily the most honourable of deaths is martyrdomBy He in whose hand my soul is, one thousand strikes with the sword are indeed easier [for me] than dying on the bed

Wisdom: بَقِيَّةُ السَّيْفِ أَنْمَى عَدَداً وَأَكْثَرُ وَلَداً
enWisdom: The survivors of war grow larger in number and have more children
The reward for striving [in the way of Allah] is the greatest reward
Many a war is more beneficial than peace
The purification of the body is [in] striving and fasting

Wisdom: زَكَاةُ الشَّجَاعَةِ الْجِهَادُ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: The alms-tax of courage is struggling in the way of Allah

Wisdom: صَمْداً صَمْداً حَتَّى يَنْجَلِيَ لَكُمْ عَمُودُ الْحَقِّ وَأَنْتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ وَاللَّهُ مَعَكُمْ وَلَنْ يَتِرَكُمْ أَعْمالَكُمْ
enWisdom: Keep on enduring and remain firm, until the pillar of truth illuminates upon you while you have the upper hand, and Allah is with you, and never will He stint [the reward of] your deeds

Wisdom: ضَارِبُوا عَنْ دِينِكُمْ بِالظُّبَى وَصِلُوا السُّيُوفَ بِالْخُطَا وَانْتَصِرُوا بِاللَّهِ تَظْفَرُوا وَتُنْصَرُوا
enWisdom: Defend your religion with the edge of blades, charge forward [against the enemy] with your swords and seek the help of Allah you will gain victory and [His] assistance

Wisdom: مَنْ جَاهَدَ عَلَى إِقَامَةِ الْحَقِّ وُفِّقَ
enWisdom: One who struggles to establish the truth is granted success [by Allah]
